job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you want to work at the forefront of the changes in the financial services industry and develop central Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform? Then we have a challenging position for you! The ML & AI enablement team at ABN AMRO is looking for an AI Platform Engineer with an innovative mindset, feel for business and engineering drive. You'll be part of a multidisciplinary team to build robust and scalable solutions for business needs. We are looking for creative and passionate people with a "go get it" mentality. You will have the opportunity to work in a highly skilled environment where you get to design, build and integrate cutting edge infrastructure solutions.

Your job

     * Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.
     * Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
     * Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.
     * Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.
     * Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.
     * Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.
     * Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.
     * Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.
job_details.full_text:
AI Platform Engineer

Do you want to work at the forefront of the changes in the financial services industry and develop central Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform? Then we have a challenging position for you! The ML & AI enablement team at ABN AMRO is looking for an AI Platform Engineer with an innovative mindset, feel for business and engineering drive. You'll be part of a multidisciplinary team to build robust and scalable solutions for business needs. We are looking for creative and passionate people with a "go get it" mentality. You will have the opportunity to work in a highly skilled environment where you get to design, build and integrate cutting edge infrastructure solutions.

Your job

     * Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.
     * Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
     * Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.
     * Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.
     * Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.
     * Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.
     * Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.
     * Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining infrastructure for an AI platform, focusing on CI/CD pipelines, reliability, and seamless operation of Azure AI services. While it mentions GenAI capabilities, the core responsibilities lean towards infrastructure engineering, MLOps, and supporting Data Science teams, aligning more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile's focus on productionizing and maintaining AI systems rather than developing generative models themselves.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform', 'Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps', 'Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments', 'Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services', and 'Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products' directly relate to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions CI/CD pipelines, a core component of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring reliability and seamless operation are key responsibilities in maintaining production-grade AI environments.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.

job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the operational deployment and management of cloud-based AI services.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.

job_tasks.justification: Integrating various tools and technologies into a DevOps toolchain to accelerate the journey from development to real-world applications implies building and maintaining the software ecosystem that supports AI use cases.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.

job_tasks.justification: Identifying industry best practices and assessing their feasibility and benefits requires understanding the business context and strategic alignment.
job_tasks.phrase: Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services involves software development principles applied to infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.

job_tasks.justification: Monitoring system health, usage, and availability is a critical part of operations engineering and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with various team members and teams
